law.text:
A motor carrier is responsible for the expense of an emergency response, containment, cleanup, and abatement by a paid fire department if the motor carrier:
Transports a hazardous material in commerce on a highway in the State; and
Is at fault and causes a traffic accident in the State that results in:
A spill or discharge of hazardous materials; and
An emergency response, containment, cleanup, and abatement by the paid fire department.
